name: Hong Kong Style Wo Bar
description: Jumbo shrimp, lobster, and scallops with broccoli, fresh mushrooms, and snow pea pods in a white sauce. Served on a hot sizzling platter.

name: Seafood Wo Bar
description: Lobster, shrimp, and scallops with broccoli, fresh mushrooms, and snow pea pods in an oyster sauce. Served on a hot sizzling platter.

name: Beef with Scallions and Onions
description: Tender beef wtih stalks of scallions and onions.

name: Chicken (Coconut, Honey, or Lemon
description: Lightly coated white meat chicken with specified sauce.
